description:
Welcome to the realm where speed reigns supreme. One of Vert Wheeler's most wanted cars can finally be yours! 

From the acclaimed animated series AcceleRacers, Power Rage™, the car that replaced Deora II™ when it was destroyed, will take you at full speed to the realm... of victories! Featuring neon lights to race even in the dark with unmistakable style, and a huge rear wing to keep you glued to the track while still ready to fly across the finish line. 

Unleash the fury of 410 horsepower and tame this racing beast! Add Power Rage™ to your collection now!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 2
name: HOT WHEELS™ - AcceleRacers Power Rage™
